name: mack-link
description: A personal URL shortener built with Cloudflare Workers and React

scripts.build: npm -w admin run build && npm -w worker run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm -w worker run deploy
scripts.test:ci: npm run test && npm run validate:local
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && npm -w worker run clean || true && rm -f worker/src/admin-assets.js && rm -rf worker/.wrangler && rm -rf admin/dist
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && echo 'All linting completed'
scripts.security:audit: npm audit --audit-level=moderate && npm -w worker exec npm audit --audit-level=moderate || true && npm -w admin exec npm audit --audit-level=moderate || true
scripts.security:fix: npm audit fix || true && npm -w worker exec npm audit fix || true && npm -w admin exec npm audit fix || true
scripts.maintenance: npm run security:audit && npm run test:ci && npm run validate:prod
scripts.ci:build: npm ci && npm run lint:all && npm run build
scripts.ci:test: npm run ci:build && npm run test:ci

author: SpyicyDev
